title: Ambient Music Mega Bundle - Volume 1
description: Unleash the power of 60 captivating ambient music albums in this exclusive Mega Bundle! Escape to breathtaking landscapes, explore the mysteries of forgotten ruins, and delve into the depths of your imagination – all with the evocative power of music.
longDescription:
Immerse Yourself in a Universe of Ambience: The Mega Ambient Bundle


Unleash the power of 60 captivating ambient music albums in this exclusive Mega Bundle of over 600 tracks! Escape to breath-taking landscapes, explore the mysteries of forgotten ruins, and delve into the depths of your imagination – all with the evocative power of music and 30 hours of ambient music.


Each of the 60 albums boasts:


  • 10 captivating tracks each: Experience a rich soundscape that seamlessly blends ambient sounds with enchanting melodies.


  • 30 minutes each: Diverse ambience reflective of various scenarios and locations.


  • Diverse themes to suit your mood: Immerse yourself in a variety of environments, including:


  • Alien Worlds: Explore the mysteries of two distinct extra-terrestrial landscapes with Alien Worlds 1 and Alien Worlds 2.
  • https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=huL14J3a0xw


  • Ancient Ruins: Unearth the secrets of forgotten civilizations in two captivating volumes: Ancient Ruins 1 and Ancient Ruins 2.
  • https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RzZV7kik4KU


  • Beaches: Find serenity on sun-drenched shores with two unique experiences: Beaches 1 and Beaches 2.
  • https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QHniCLxtNaQ


  • Caves: Delve into the atmospheric depths with Caves 1 and Caves 2.
  • https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EtlhEzBR-TI


  • China: Journey through the captivating soundscapes of China 1 and China 2.
  • https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3Jjl3KbPTdo


  • Deserts: Discover the vast beauty and tranquillity of Deserts 1 and Deserts 2.
  • https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UmauRW1bS6U


  • Forests: Find peace and rejuvenation amidst the vibrant sounds of Forests 1 and Forests 2.
  • https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b5cDoQasfYk


  • Frozen Tundra: Explore the stark beauty of the frozen north with Frozen Tundra 1 and Frozen Tundra 2.
  • https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PhMOnn3cv6U


  • Japan: Immerse yourself in the cultural and natural serenity of Japan 1 and Japan 2.
  • https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WpphNZVltbw


  • Marshlands: Discover the unique sounds and rhythms of the marshlands in Marshlands 1 and Marshlands 2.
  • https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MRs8mIWJqiw


  • Mountains: Ascend the majestic peaks and explore the valleys below with Mountains 1 and Mountains 2.
  • https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_Oq_p-eaTgw


  • Nature: Reconnect with the natural world through the calming melodies of Nature 1 and Nature 2.
  • https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6YNlOZYhf78


  • Oceans: Dive deep into the underwater world and experience the tranquillity of Oceans 1 and Oceans 2.
  • https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=d-1aeRcR4EM


  • Science Fiction: Explore the wonders of the cosmos and beyond with the futuristic soundscapes of Science Fiction 1 and Science Fiction 2.
  • https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rLl17nRoqPw


  • Underwater: Descend into the mysterious depths and discover the beauty of the underwater world in Underwater 1 and Underwater 2.
  • https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=abGJfQinYa4


  • Bamboo Forest: Find serenity and focus amidst the rustling leaves of Bamboo Forest 1 and Bamboo Forest 2.
  • Blizzards: Experience the power and awe of winter storms with Blizzards 1 and Blizzards 2.
  • Caves 3 & Caves 4: Delve deeper into the atmospheric underworld with two more albums dedicated to the captivating sounds of caves.
  • Cherry Blossoms: Celebrate the delicate beauty of spring with Cherry Blossoms 1 and Cherry Blossoms 2.
  • Coastal Storm: Witness the raw power and drama of the coast with Coastal Storm 1 and Coastal Storm 2.
  • Desert Oasis: Discover a haven of peace and tranquillity amidst the desert sands with Desert Oasis 1 and Desert Oasis 2.
  • Estuary: Explore the unique sounds and rhythms where freshwater meets saltwater in Estuary 1 and Estuary 2.
  • Farms: Find comfort and nostalgia in the familiar sounds of country life with Farms 1 and Farms 2.
  • Fjords: Explore the breath-taking natural beauty of fjords with Fjords 1 and Fjords 2.
  • Forests 3 & Forests 4: Lose yourself in the vibrant sounds of the woodlands with two more albums dedicated to the beauty of forests.
  • Frozen Tundra 3 & Frozen Tundra 4: Experience the vastness and solitude of the frozen north with two more expeditions into the tundra.
  • Ice Caves: Discover the wonder and mystery of glistening ice formations with Ice Caves 1 and Ice Caves 2.
  • Jungles: Immerse yourself in the lush soundscapes and vibrant life of the jungle with Jungles 1 and Jungles 2.
  • Lava Fields: Witness the raw power and energy of the Earth with Lava Fields 1 and Lava Fields 2.
  • Meadows: Find peace and tranquillity amidst the wildflowers with Meadows 1 and Meadows 2.


Unparalleled Value:


Normally, a bundle of 15 ambient albums would cost $199.99. Four bundles would cost you $796! But with the Mega Ambient Bundle, you get a whopping 60 unique albums for just $349.99. That's a massive saving of $446!


More previews of each of the albums available on YouTube:

https://www.youtube.com/c/PhatPhrogStudios


--


We also have a number of other music collections and bundles available for sale at our publisher page, click here to check out our catalogue.
technicalDetails:

Do Sound FX loop: (No)

Number of tracks: 600

Number of cues: 600

Minutes of audio provided: 1800 Minutes (30 Hours)

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes)
